channel.title: Maybe there is way
channel.description:
Well, I've been thinking, maybe there is a way to sell MoparScape items legally through your server. How you ask? If you made the model yourself. Technically, your selling [b]YOUR[/b] game model through a server you developed. You are not selling anything that is JaGex's property.
Our models suck though, thats the problem, but there is a solution. You grab the 3d model of a God Sword for example, and build a replica of one, but not exactly the same. And there you go, you have your god sword model. The only problem is, the specials, etc. So a god sword wouldn't be the best, but on most servers, people literally sell phats for real life money. Just make a party hat replica and we're all good.
What do you think?

item.title: Maybe there is way
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Doesn’t matter, anyway. Anyone who sells items on their shitty server are completely gay.

Read full topic

item.title: Maybe there is way
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Lin:

Or we can just say to hell with Jagex and do whatever we want because the odds of us getting in trouble (Out of everybody else) are slim. Even if we do get in trouble, to hell with them.

That’s what we have been doing for years.

Read full topic

item.title: Maybe there is way
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Or you can just make an Item exactly like it…

item.title: Maybe there is way
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

Chassy13:

You’re still using their client. Maybe you could sell the file without ever selling it on your server?

Yeah, but its not their item, so they have no control over the item, its not there model, therefor, perfectly legal.

Read full topic
